title: Frontend Developer - React.js
description: Join our growing frontend team to build scalable UI components and dashboards using React and Tailwind CSS.
requirements:
### Requirements
- Strong knowledge of React.js and Hooks
- Familiarity with Tailwind CSS and responsive design
- Experience with REST APIs and Git
- Bonus: Knowledge of Supabase, Clerk, or Shadcn UI

### Perks
- Remote-friendly
- Learning budget
- Health insurance

title: Backend Developer - Node.js
description: We’re looking for a Node.js developer to create APIs and manage our scalable backend infrastructure.
requirements:
### Requirements
- Proficient in Node.js and Express
- Experience with PostgreSQL or MongoDB
- Familiarity with authentication & RESTful services
- Bonus: Familiarity with Supabase functions

### Benefits
- Work-from-home
- 5-day work week
- Competitive salary

title: Full Stack Developer (MERN)
description: Looking for a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in the MERN stack to work on high-impact features.
requirements:
### Skills
- MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js
- Tailwind or Bootstrap for styling
- Version control using Git/GitHub
- API integration & testing using Postman

### Extras
- Opportunity to work on live projects
- Access to premium Udemy courses

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We’re hiring a creative UI/UX Designer to help shape modern user experiences and design intuitive interfaces.
requirements:
### Responsibilities
- Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes
- Design consistent UI using Figma or Adobe XD
- Work closely with devs to bring designs to life
- User research & accessibility best practices

### Tools
- Figma, Illustrator, Photoshop
- Notion, Zeplin

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Hiring a DevOps Engineer to automate deployments and maintain CI/CD pipelines for scalable apps.
requirements:
### Requirements
- Experience with AWS/GCP, Docker, and Kubernetes
- Knowledge of CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions, Jenkins
- Familiarity with Infra-as-Code (Terraform, Pulumi)
- Monitor and log system performance

### Benefits
- Remote + stock options
- Paid certifications

title: Mobile App Developer - Flutter
description: We’re building cross-platform apps and need a Flutter expert to join our fast-paced dev team.
requirements:
### Skills Needed
- Flutter & Dart for Android/iOS
- Integration with Firebase or Supabase
- Experience with BLoC or Provider
- REST APIs & state management

### Perks
- Flexible working hours
- Access to Mac devices for testing
- Paid time off
